queries.query:
from(bucket: "tp2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sPower")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telegraf")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tp2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sHumidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tp2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sCooling")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cooling")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "contrib/bonitoo-io/alerta"
from(bucket: "tp2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sTemperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp1" or r["_field"] == "temp2" or r["_field"] == "temp3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telegraf")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
